m_szDocTitle: Remote presence display through remotely controlled robot - InTouch Technologies, Inc.
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Remote presence display through remotely controlled robot United States Patent 7761185 Abstract: A robot system that includes a robot and a remote station. The robot and remote station contain monitors, cameras, speakers and microphones that allow for two-way videoconferencing between a physician at the remote station and a patient in the vicinity of the robot. The system also includes a patient monitor that displays patient information such as an x-ray. The patient monitor can be seen by the patient, and by the physician through the robot camera.
